body_html:
I used 2.2b, this is the top one which is present in the release page https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases which is linked to from the setup instructions: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.8/get_started/os_setup.html#installation-for-linux

What is the recommended version?
